attributes.additional_details: Following the costly Scottish independence vote, a seperate referendum should be held by England, Wales and Northern Ireland, over Scotland's continuing inclusion within the uk. I call for a yes/no vote to be called before the end of 2016, with the ultimate aim of Scotland to be removed from the uk by the end of 2018

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Referendum to Remove Scotland from the UK

Created by: Jack Chambers

Closing date: 30/03/2015
